explanation:
OS_ObjectIndexFromToken — the only non-library callee of OS_CondVarSignal_Impl per the call graph; inspect its body to ensure it does not (directly or indirectly) call OS_CondVarSignal_Impl or any function that leads back to it.
pthread_cond_signal — a library call made by the target; confirm it will not call back into application code (to rule out indirect recursion via the threading library).
OS_CondVarSignal — the public wrapper that calls OS_CondVarSignal_Impl; include it to detect possible mutual recursion (Impl -> ... -> wrapper -> Impl).
OS_OBJECT_TABLE_GET — the macro used to obtain impl (may expand to a function call or sequence of calls); inspect its definition to verify what actual calls occur (e.g., it may expand to OS_ObjectIndexFromToken or other helpers that could introduce recursion).
